\r
type Theme = "dark" | "light" | "system"\r
\r
type ThemeProviderProps = {\r
  children: React.ReactNode\r
  defaultTheme?: Theme\r
  storageKey?: string\r
}\r
\r
type ThemeProviderState = {\r
  theme: Theme\r
  setTheme: (theme: Theme) => void\r
}\r
\r
const initialState: ThemeProviderState = {\r
  theme: "system",\r
  setTheme: () => null,\r
}\r
\r
const ThemeProviderContext = createContext<ThemeProviderState>(initialState)\r
\r
export function ThemeProvider({\r
  children,\r
  defaultTheme = "system",\r
  storageKey = "vite-ui-theme",\r
  ...props\r
}: ThemeProviderProps) {\r
  const [theme, setTheme] = useState<Theme>(\r
    () => (localStorage.getItem(storageKey) as Theme) || defaultTheme\r
  )\r
\r
  useEffect(() => {\r
    const root = window.document.documentElement\r
\r
    root.classList.remove("light", "dark")\r
\r
    if (theme === "system") {\r
      const systemTheme = window.matchMedia("(prefers-color-scheme: dark)")\r
        .matches\r
        ? "dark"\r
        : "light"\r
\r
      root.classList.add(systemTheme)\r
      return\r
    }\r
\r
    root.classList.add(theme)\r
  }, [theme])\r
\r
  const value = {\r
    theme,\r
    setTheme: (theme: Theme) => {\r
      localStorage.setItem(storageKey, theme)\r
      setTheme(theme)\r
    },\r
  }\r
\r
  return (\r
    <ThemeProviderContext.Provider {...props} value={value}>\r
      {children}\r
    </ThemeProviderContext.Provider>\r
  )\r
}\r
\r
export const useTheme = () => {\r
  const context = useContext(ThemeProviderContext)\r
\r
  if (context === undefined)\r
    throw new Error("useTheme must be used within a ThemeProvider")\r
\r
  return context\r
}

{ Moon, Sun } from "lucide-react"\r
\r
import { Button } from "@/components/ui/button"\r
import {\r
  DropdownMenu,\r
  DropdownMenuContent,\r
  DropdownMenuItem,\r
  DropdownMenuTrigger,\r
} from "@/components/ui/dropdown-menu"\r
import { useTheme } from "@/components/theme-provider"\r
\r
export function ModeToggle() {\r
  const { setTheme } = useTheme()\r
\r
  return (\r
    <DropdownMenu>\r
      <DropdownMenuTrigger asChild>\r
        <Button variant="outline" size="icon">\r
          <Sun className="h-[1.2rem] w-[1.2rem] rotate-0 scale-100 transition-all dark:-rotate-90 dark:scale-0" />\r
          <Moon className="absolute h-[1.2rem] w-[1.2rem] rotate-90 scale-0 transition-all dark:rotate-0 dark:scale-100" />\r
          <span className="sr-only">Toggle theme</span>\r
        </Button>\r
      </DropdownMenuTrigger>\r
      <DropdownMenuContent align="end">\r
        <DropdownMenuItem onClick={() => setTheme("light")}>\r
          Light\r
        </DropdownMenuItem>\r
        <DropdownMenuItem onClick={() => setTheme("dark")}>\r
          Dark\r
        </DropdownMenuItem>\r
        <DropdownMenuItem onClick={() => setTheme("system")}>\r
          System\r
        </DropdownMenuItem>\r
      </DropdownMenuContent>\r
    </DropdownMenu>\r
  )\r
}
